sentences.en: Appearance and Properties A lustrous , greyish black, brittle, sublimate, poisonous, corrosive halogen element.
sentences.cn: 性状:紫黑色固体, 性脆, 易升华, 有毒.

sentences.en: Design, let the sense of vision dulcify, let the brand sublimate!
sentences.cn: 设计, 让视觉愉悦, 让品牌升华!

sentences.en: He could try to sublimate the problem by writing, in detail, about it.
sentences.cn: 他可以努力通过详细记述该问题而使其受到人们的正视。

sentences.en: In breathing, the memory that puts blue on the ice gradually sublimate, interweave with the sky.
sentences.cn: 喘息中, 冰蓝色的记忆渐渐升华, 和天空交织.

sentences.en: Let the life sublimate in respectfully to, lets the trail which the time record we struggle!
sentences.cn: 让生命在聆听中升华, 让时光记录我们奋斗的足迹!

sentences.en: Love causes the life to be rich; the pain causes love to sublimate.
sentences.cn: 爱情使人生丰富, 痛苦使爱情升华.

sentences.en: State and thought can be surmounted, spirit is OK sublimate, but force cannot be surmounted.
sentences.cn: 境界和思想可以超越, 精神可以升华, 但力量不可超越.

sentences.en: Subdue Tamasic action, sublimate Rajas into Sattva by selfless service, transcend Sattva by Self - Knowledge.
sentences.cn: 遏止惰性的行为,提升动性的行为, 使之成为纯净性, 再用自性的知识来超越这分纯净性.

sentences.en: The mineral can be found in hot spring deposits and as a volcanic sublimate product.
sentences.cn: 这种矿物可以在温泉的沈淀物中找到,它也是火山的升华产物.

sentences.en: We have to somehow sublimate those male hormones, or at least get them under control. "
sentences.cn: 我们需要以某种方式使这种荷尔蒙升华或者至少把它们控制起来. ”

sentences.en: We need suBlimate water for our experiment.
sentences.cn: 我们的实验需要纯净化的水.

words.tran_cn: 庄严的；令人崇敬的；极端的；超群的
[物] 升华，[心理] 升华作用；高尚化；升华物
使…纯化；使…升华；使…变高尚
纯净化的；理想化的；高尚的

trans.tran_en: to use the energy that comes from sexual feelings to do something, such as work or art, that is more acceptable to your society
